title: Skyline Provisions, Inc., Recalls Beef Products Due To E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, April 27, 2015 Skyline Provisions, Inc., a Harvey, Ill., establishment, is recalling 1,029 pounds of beef products contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.Produced between April 15-25, 2015, the following products are subject...
